resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Lost makes two arm spike attacks.

action.name: Arm Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Embrace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition frightened}, and it takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The Lost can embrace only one creature at a time.

reaction.name: Tightening Embrace
entries: If the Lost takes damage while it has a creature {@condition grappled}, that creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.
